title: Why is there no way to avoid people threatening to feed or AFK without dodging?
body: As much as I love this game the biggest flaw that puts me off is the lack of ability to kick someone that is threatening to feed, AFK and troll because they didn't get their role, they feel like trolling or they had a bad game previously so for some reason they want to take it out on everyone else just trying to play the game, In my most recent game of Ranked two people had called bot because they were duo, and our third pick said he would have to adc because he doesn't know anything else and he/she apologised, but the duo didn't care they immediately picked Heimerdinger and Leona and both said they were going mid to feed. For the worlds most popular game I'm surprised that I'm only limited to reporting people after the game even though its too late and I've lost my LP already. Why are players limited to only reporting after a game? Why can't we report or vote to kick players threatening to troll, afk and feed?

replies.body:
Hey man, Sorry you had to go through a negative experience! 

I know that feel man when your team starts fighting before the game even begins due to wanting to play the same role/lane. We are working on solving this issue but not by adding a "kick" feature. What we are looking to do is through [Ranked Team Builder](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2ws22k/i_miss_doing_tribunal_work/cou0c1c). If we remove root cause/reason of these people trolling then it will almost never happen.

If we remove root cause/reason of these people trolling then it will almost never happen.

I am sorry without a vote kick function the community will never feel like they have the power to affect the outcomes of their ranked or solo q games. If someone is obviously mentally unstable enough or foolish enough to declare their intent to ruin your game you and your team as a group should have the power to effect or remove that person.

> I am sorry without a vote kick function the community will never feel like they have the power to affect the outcomes of their ranked or solo q games.

I'm sorry but I have to disagree with you on that. I don't feel that way, lots of people I know don't feel that way. Just because you feel that way doesn't make it apply to everyone.

There will always be trolls. By making a Team ranked system i am sure you might beat the whole i am upset someone stole my role behavior but if someone goes into a game with the intent to troll what defense do you have to stop that. ATM and it happens frequently someone goes into a ranked team setup telling everyone they are going to troll and by dodging you effectively let the troll win and the good  player is punished. By not dodging you allow them to gratify themselves at your expense. What defense does the normal player who wants to win a game have?.

> There will always be trolls.

Exactly. There **will** always be trolls. Their intentions are to annoy people and waste peoples time. I'm quite confident they don't care whether they waste 20 minutes or 20 seconds of someone's time, as long as they get a response. While a "champ select kick system" might make it easier on people who play the game for fun or to win it doesn't solve/neutralise the troll problem.
I seem to have found a forum warrior. Ok lets hear your suggestions.

You will always find what you are looking for, if you expect negative sh*t about something else that sucks all the time that is what you will find here

> if you expect negative sh*t about something else that sucks all the time that is what you will find here

That's pretty much all I find here, regardless of what I expect or look for.
There is a difference between Threatening and actually doing.

People dodge based off of threats, its hard to enjoy a game of LoL when you have people verbally abusing others, threatening to make troll picks and taking Clairvoyance and Clarity because they didn't get what they want. If someone is threatening something in champ select as a team you should be able to stop it in some way.
